profile.name: Sahil Lavingia
profile.title: Founder, Gumroad & Flexile
profile.about: Sahil Lavingia is the founder and CEO of Gumroad. He solo-founded Gumroad in 2011 and raised $10M+ from Kleiner Perkins, Lowercase Capital, First Round Capital, Naval Ravikant, Max Levchin, and others. Prior to starting Gumroad, Sahil was employee #2 at Pinterest. He is also a VC at his rolling fund, shl.vc which invests in early stage companies, including HelloSign (acquired by Dropbox), Lambda School, Figma, Notion, Clubhouse and many more. Lavingia is also author of the book 'The Minimalist Entrepreneur'.

questions: What inspired you to create Gumroad and how did you get started with raising funds for it?
What were the downsides of not growing the business by more than 20% each month?
What led Sahil Lavingia to continue with Gumroad against some investors' advice?
What steps did you take to improve your financial situation after realizing you were paying more in expenses than you were generating in revenue?
